title: Udemy
description: Udemy offers some free courses, the majority of its courses are paid.

title: KhanAcademy
description: Khan Academy is a free online learning platform.

title: Udacity
description: Udacity is an online learning platform that offers courses, nanodegrees, which are either free or paid courses.

title: FreeCodeCamp
description: FreeCodeCamp provides free online courses which are project-based, meaning you'll work on real-world projects, which helps to build practical skills.

title: The Odin Project
description: The Odin Project is a free, open-source curriculum for learning web development.

title: Coursera
description: Coursera is a learning platform that offers courses, certificate and degree programs.
